@@ -222,0 +222,5 @@
+  // we use this method at some places for writing to 0 e.g. to cause a crash;
+  // ubsan does not know that this is the desired behavior
+  #if defined(__clang__) || defined(__GNUC__)
+  __attribute__((no_sanitize("undefined")))
+  #endif
